meanings: (시골) the country, the countryside, rural area

vlive.korean: 감사합니다. - 채연 언니 촌 흔들어줘요. Thank you. - Chaeyeon, wave your hand. 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA] 다이아 돌잔치
vlive.english: Thank you. - Chaeyeon, wave your hand.

vlive.korean: 촌사람이야. - 이렇게... I'm from a small town. - Like so... 듣기 View video V Beauty : 아름다운 팔 라인을 샤샤샤~ 홍주연의 HOT BODY
vlive.english: I'm from a small town. - Like so...

vlive.korean: 우이동 계곡 가고 싶네요. - 우이동 MT촌 옛날에 진짜 많이 갔는데. I want to go to a water park. We used to go there a lot. 듣기 View video QUEEN : 제1회 퀸씨배 인디알까기 최강자전
vlive.english: I want to go to a water park. We used to go there a lot.

비숑 - 숑... Bichon. - "Chon"... 듣기 View video TWICE : 나모사

examples.korean: During the trip toured refugee camps near the Afghan border. 발음듣기 그녀는 여행 중 아프간 국경지대 근처의 난민 촌을 방문했다. Neungyule
examples.english: During the trip toured refugee camps near the Afghan border. 발음

examples.korean: Traditional Houses Fight for Survival 발음듣기 동소문동 한옥 촌 보존을 위해 싸우다 Neungyule
examples.english: Traditional Houses Fight for Survival 발음

examples.korean: She isn't one to stay in such a rural area as this. 발음듣기 그녀는 이런 촌구석에 있을 사람이 아니다 Neungyule
examples.english: She isn't one to stay in such a rural area as this. 발음

examples.korean: I don't want to live in this backcountry anymore. 발음듣기 더 이상 이런 촌구석에서 살고 싶지 않다 Neungyule
examples.english: I don't want to live in this backcountry anymore. 발음

examples.korean: It would be a shame to let his talents go to waste in the boondocks. 발음듣기 그는 촌구석에서 썩기에는 아까운 인물이다 Neungyule
examples.english: It would be a shame to let his talents go to waste in the boondocks. 발음
